title: "Machine Madness"
content:
Welcome to Machine Madness! Our website is dedicated to all things mechanical and futuristic. We feature a collection of wallpapers that showcase the dark and ominous side of technology, with abstract illustrations of machines that will leave you in awe. 

Our wallpapers are perfect for anyone who loves science fiction, cyberpunk, or industrial aesthetics. Whether you're looking to spruce up your desktop background or add some edge to your phone screen, we've got you covered.

At Machine Madness, we believe that technology can be both beautiful and terrifying, and our wallpapers reflect that duality. So if you're ready to embrace the darker side of the digital world, come explore our collection and find the perfect wallpaper to suit your style.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper featuring an abstract illustration of a dark and ominous machine, with glowing red lights and mechanical parts."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
